Welcome to Friday Ehiguese Personal Homepage

Who is Friday Ehiguese?

I strieve for balance. So, I work hard and play plentifully.

I love to laugh and have fun. I enjoy singing and dancing. Also, I love to cook and bake cake. Well, vanilla cake is my favourite. I also scuba dive when I can. On most weekeds, I unwind watching football and am a Chelsea fan. Please watch my video clip for more detail about me

Friday Ehiguese

Why CodeYourFuture?

I am an enthusiastic, innovative and hard working professional with passion to use technology to create positive change. I have always been fascinated by the power of technology to solve problems and improve people's lives. In today's world, software is everywhere and plays a crucial role in almost every aspect of our daily lives. This has inspired me to learn more about software development and pursue it as a career.

Over the past few years, I have been teaching myself the basics of programming and have worked on various personal projects. I have gained a strong foundation in programming languages such as Python and SQL, and have also familiarized myself with various software development tools and technologies. Despite my self-studies, I have come to realize that there is still so much to learn and that a formal education in full stack software development would be invaluable in furthering my skills and knowledge.

I am particularly drawn to your program because of its focus on practical, hands-on learning and its reputation for producing highly skilled and successful full stack software developers. I am eager to learn from experienced professionals in the field and to collaborate with other like-minded individuals to develop my skills and build a solid portfolio of projects.

I am confident that with my strong work ethic, passion for technology, and commitment to learning, I will be able to make the most of the opportunities provided by your program. I am fully dedicated to taking on any challenges and pushing myself to reach my full potential as a full stack software developer.
